Title: A Royal Cure
Description:
Poultice no work! Wax right, venom wrong?

Yes... yes! Strongest cure need strongest venom. Nebb saw crawler. She queen in red and black, too big to bother with kobolds. Queen smelled juicy grubs and skittered for cave.

Now you must follow. Collect royal venom. Please, Snubjaw have little time.
ObjectivesText: Collect Queen Rickiticka's Venom to make a new poultice for Snubjaw.
PortraitGiverText: The Crawler Queen spreads her swarm through the Chittering Den.
RewardText: It work! He no green now. Thank you, thank you for saving friend Snubjaw.

Objectives.Text: Give Queen Rickiticka's Venom to Nebb
